channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Pipeline: Phoenix AutoTest Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Pipeline: Phoenix AutoTest Plugin

item.title: CVE-2022-28158|2024-08-03T05:48:37.486Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20pipeline%3A%20phoenix%20autotest%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins Pipeline: Phoenix AutoTest Plugin 1.3 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to enumerate credentials IDs of credentials stored in Jenkins.

item.title: CVE-2022-28156|2024-08-03T05:48:37.350Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20pipeline%3A%20phoenix%20autotest%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Pipeline: Phoenix AutoTest Plugin 1.3 and earlier allows attackers with Item/Configure permission to copy arbitrary files and directories from the Jenkins controller to the agent workspace.

item.title: CVE-2022-28155|2024-08-03T05:48:37.266Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20pipeline%3A%20phoenix%20autotest%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Pipeline: Phoenix AutoTest Plugin 1.3 and earlier does not configure its XML parser to prevent XML external entity (XXE) attacks.

item.title: CVE-2022-28157|2024-08-03T05:48:37.133Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20pipeline%3A%20phoenix%20autotest%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Pipeline: Phoenix AutoTest Plugin 1.3 and earlier allows attackers with Item/Configure permission to upload arbitrary files from the Jenkins controller via FTP to an attacker-specified FTP server.
